description: Detects an attempt to execute code or create service on remote host via winrm.vbs. Author: Julia Fomina, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use for administartive purposes. Unlikely
name: Remote Code Execute via Winrm.vbs
query: (process.executable:*\\cscript.exe AND process.command_line:*winrm* AND process.command_line:*invoke\ Create\ wmicimv2\/Win32_* AND process.command_line:*\-r\:http*)
